subject: College Athletics
Basketball
lead_paragraph: The largest crowd to ever watch a women’s game at the Lloyd Noble Center saw Courtney Paris, the Sooners’ center, surpass 2,000 career points while leading her team to victory.
snippet: The largest crowd to ever watch a women’s game at the Lloyd Noble Center saw Courtney Paris, the Sooners’ center, surpass 2,000 career points while leading her team to victory.
